title: Cronosurf Soccer
summary: The soccer watch that lets you kick the ball - and score goals! +Wear Watch Face
description: Cronosurf Soccer is made for soccer fans and everyone that likes unusual watches! Based on Cronosurf Breeze, it nicely shows a soccer play field and even lets you kick the ball with the second-hand! There is even a goal and a goal keeper - and yes, you can kick for goals!Enjoy all the lovingly created graphics, animation and sound effects. Show it to your friends and challenge them to score a goal in a shorter time than you. Play watch soccer today!Key features    • NEW: Android Wear now supported! Play now on your Wear watch!    • Current date and day of the week with the unique Cronosurf Monthly Calendar    • Continuous indication on date field (serves as an AM/PM indicator)    • Keep-screen-on timer for 5 minutes (specially useful for Smartwatches; can be triggered via the graphical menu or by pressing the physical menu button if available)    • Live Wallpaper with adjustable size and position of the watch. (The standard procedure to enable it: long-press on a free area of your home screen and select "Live Wallpapers".)    • It can run over the screen lockThis is the free version. If you like it and would like to support the development, consider the Pro version, which includes the following extra features:- Ad-free- 5 customizable color presets- Option: National flags on the hour markers - after each goal they rotate by one notch- Option: Reverse kick- Landscape mode support- For the Live Wallpaper, any image from the gallery can be set as a background imageTo find out more about Cronosurf, visit http://cronosurf.com.
descriptionHTML:
Cronosurf Soccer is made for soccer fans and everyone that likes unusual watches! Based on Cronosurf Breeze, it nicely shows a soccer play field and even lets you kick the ball with the second-hand! There is even a goal and a goal keeper - and yes, you can kick for goals!

Enjoy all the lovingly created graphics, animation and sound effects. Show it to your friends and challenge them to score a goal in a shorter time than you. Play watch soccer today!




Key features
• NEW: Android Wear now supported! Play now on your Wear watch!
• Current date and day of the week with the unique Cronosurf Monthly Calendar
• Continuous indication on date field (serves as an AM/PM indicator)
• Keep-screen-on timer for 5 minutes (specially useful for Smartwatches; can be triggered via the graphical menu or by pressing the physical menu button if available)
• Live Wallpaper with adjustable size and position of the watch. (The standard procedure to enable it: long-press on a free area of your home screen and select "Live Wallpapers".)
• It can run over the screen lock


This is the free version. If you like it and would like to support the development, consider the Pro version, which includes the following extra features:
- Ad-free
- 5 customizable color presets
- Option: National flags on the hour markers - after each goal they rotate by one notch
- Option: Reverse kick
- Landscape mode support
- For the Live Wallpaper, any image from the gallery can be set as a background image


To find out more about Cronosurf, visit http://cronosurf.com.
comments: It's a Funny game It's an entertaining game while waiting for the train to arrive or something.
recentChanges: - The battery indication now also appears on the Live Wallpaper
- Support for Android Wear watches added
- New hour and minute hand design
